Busisiwe Paulina "Busi" Shiba bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa bụ onye bụ Mpumalanga MEC ugbu a maka Ọrụ Ugbo, Mmepe Ime Obodo, Ala na Mmekọrịta Gburugburu Ebe Obibi. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Mpumalanga MEC maka Gọọmentị Nkwado na Ihe Omenala site na 2021 ruo 2022, dị ka Onye isi oche nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Mpumalanga site na 2019 ruo 2021 nakwa dị ka MEC maka Mmepe Ọha site na 2016 ruo 2019
Shiba bụ onye otu African National Congress (ANC).

Shiba bụ onye isi obodo nke Chief Albert Luthuli Local Municipality na Carolina tupu onye bụbu onye isi ala nke Mpumalanga na onye osote onye isi ala ugbu a bụ David Mabuza gbanwere ụlọ ọrụ ya ma mee Shiba MEC ọhụrụ nke Social Development n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ntuli aka gọọmentị ime obodo nke August 2016 gasịrị. A họpụtakwara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọkọ nke Mpumalanga African National Congress Women's League (ANC).
